pageCopy.metaDescription: Bring the cloud to your home with umbrelOS - a beautiful home server OS for self-hosting, and Umbrel Home - a plug-and-play home server. Install Nextcloud, Jellyfin, Bitcoin node, and hundreds of self-hosted apps in one click.
pageCopy.ogTitle: Umbrel - Personal home cloud and OS for self-hosting
